829017 THE INDIAN RIFLES ACT, 1920
ACT NO. 23 OF 1920 [ 31st August, 1920]
An Act to provide for the better discipline of police officers enrolled in Military Police or Rifle Battalions.
WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for the better discipline of police officers enrolled under local Acts in Military Police or Rifle Battalions it is hereby enacted as follows:-
61088 1Short title. This Act may be called the Indian Rifles Act, 1920.
1651162 2Police officers subject to discipline and penalities prescribed in local Acts wherever serving. All police officers enrolled under the provisions of any local Military Police or Rifles Act shall be subject to the discipline and penalties prescribed by such Act, wherever serving in India.
